attributes.action: Provide support for adults with FAS and treat it as a disability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no support in England for Adults with F.A.S.
It is not recognised as a Disability, when it clearly is.  People with F.A.S are brain damaged for life, and they can't cope with day to day activities like the rest of us can.
